text: Linda French (born March 4, 1964) is an American badminton player. She competed in women's singles and women's doubles at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona. She also competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==Achievements== ===PanAm Championships=== Women's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Year ! Venue ! Partner ! Opponent !
